description:
Six months ago, a terrible motorcycle accident derailed college student http://anidb.net/ch106861 [Natsusa]`s promising rugby career. Newly out of the hospital and restarting his first year of college, Natsusa can`t quite bring himself to give up the sport, even though he`s been told that his body simply can`t handle it anymore – and his best friend since childhood http://anidb.net/ch106866 [Sei] is there to adamantly enforce the doctor`s words. So Natsusa decides to participate in the only way he still can: as a manager. It`s not the same as playing, but it does put him in a position to continue to be involved, even as repercussions from the accident in the form of another missing player and current player attitudes make it clear that this, too, is going to be an uphill battle.
Source: ANN

REGULAR.description:
Six months after a dreadful motorcycle accident, Natsusa finally returns to school. Unfortunately he has to repeat his first year of college and can no longer play the rugby he loves so much. Even so, he cannot break away himself from it.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: I`m Super Rookie Number 24!
Super Rookie Number 24 Desu
スーパールーキーnumber24です★

REGULAR.description:
While the Doushisha Rugby team is pretty strong, Natsusa worries about the upcoming finals against the strongest team in their region, Koufuuin. In order to try and keep an upper hand, Natsusa goes to drag Ibuki back into the game.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: Saifu no Charasa to, Mochinushi no Charasa wa Hobo Hirei
The Weight of a Wallet and the Wallet`s Owner Is Proportional
財布のチャラさと, 持ち主のチャラさはほぼ比例

REGULAR.description:
Ibuki comes back to the rugby club, but the third year students don`t want to accept him. Natsusa suggests a solution. Everyone tests Ibuki`s skills in rugby with a intraclub match to decide if he is useless or not. A seven-month blank is hard.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: Hiroi Ie ni Hikkoshitemo Betsu ni Katazukanai... Nimotsu Fueru dake
I Moved into a Big House, but Can`t Get It All Put Away... Things Keep Piling Up.
広い家に引っ越しても別に片付かない... 荷物増えるだけ

REGULAR.description:
Natsusa starts his dorm life with Yasunari as his roommate. Yasunari seems to hate him, which severely affects Natsusa`s mood. This time, their match is against Isui University, where the rugby team has completely changed from the previous year.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: I Can`t Win Against a Person Who Enjoys Everything So Seriously.
Nanigotomo Shinken ni Tanoshinderu Hito ni wa Kanawanai
何事も真剣に楽しんでる人には敵わない

REGULAR.description:
Yasunari gets completely defeated by Ryuusei and is in danger of being removed from the starting line-up. His stress goes over his breaking point and now Natsusa is the only person who can help him. Of course, Natsusa is willing! For a price!
Source: Funimation

titles.title: Regression Is Also Evolution.
Taika mo Shinka
退化も進化

REGULAR.description:
Natsusa`s neck gets aggravated and he gets stuck in bed. Yuu tries to help fill the void Natsusa had left behind, but finds that he is unable to do as much as he had thought. The starting line-up gets announced and the team prepares for their match.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: A Novice Cook Will Fail at Food Arrangement Almost 100% of the Time.
Ryouri Shoshinsha no Arrange wa Hobo 100% no Kakuritsu de Shippai Suru
料理初心者のアレンジはほぼ100%の確率で失敗する

REGULAR.description:
The tension grows as the other team is out to provoke Doushisha and mess up their plays. Seiichirou`s kicking problem worsens while Taisei`s hatred for Ibuki starts to affect the match. Natsusa apprehensively watches on the sidelines with Yuu.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: Meditation Is Pretty Hard.
Meisoutte Kekkou Muzukashii
瞑想って結構難しい

REGULAR.description:
Natsusa`s depression gets blown away when Seiichirou suddenly tells him to stop coming to matches. The two of them begin to fight and Ibuki decides to take things into his own hands. It seems Seiichirou needs time to think about why he plays rugby.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: Mokuhyou to Shudan wa Tochuu de Goccha ni Nari Gachi
The Goal and Method Often Gets Muddled in the Process.
目標と手段は途中でごっちゃになりがち

REGULAR.description:
Now that Seiichirou`s problem has been resolved, the crew in Oita get to some serious relaxing. However, their team members back home are also dealing with various problems and anxieties. As Natsusa leaves Oita, Ibuki`s mother suddenly appears.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: Carbonic Acid Hot Springs Aren`t Too Hot, So You Can Stay in Them a Long Time.
Tansan Onsen wa Teion Dakara Nagaku Itte Irareru
炭酸温泉は低温だから長く入っていられる

REGULAR.description:
The members of the Doushisha rugby team work together to get themselves mentally prepared for the next match. Kotori buckles under the pressure of suddenly becoming a starting member against such a powerful school. And Ibuki challenges Kazutaka.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: Chicken Tempura Tastes the Best Right After Being Fried.
Tori Ten wa Agetate ga Ichiban Oishii
とり天は揚げたてが一番美味しい

REGULAR.description:
The match against the powerhouse, Koufuuin University, begins. Natsusa nervously watches over his teammates as each of them tackle the attacks thrown against them. Kazutaka aims for Ibuki with a vengeance and Ibuki struggles for a way out.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: Fuyu no Rugby Kansen ni wa, Arittake no Boukan o!
When Watching Rugby in Winter, Dress As Warmly As Possible!!
冬のラグビー観戦には, ありったけの防寒を!

REGULAR.description:
Koufuuin continues to lead. At such an important time, Ibuki gets wounded with a bleeding injury. However, the entire rugby team has his back and they fight to turn the tables. This is it. The rush. The feeling. The best part of rugby!
Source: Funimation

titles.title: Ganbare! Japan Rugby!!!
You Can Do It! Japan Rugby!!!
頑張れ! JAPANラグビー!!!
Omnibus Episode
Soushuuhen
総集編
Number 24
Number 24
number24
number24
ナンバー・トゥーフォー
